snippet: We just returned from a two-week stay in New England. Sure, some of the roads evidenced damage from Irene, but they were passable, and even interesting to see, from a sensational point of view.
lead_paragraph: We just returned from a two-week stay in New England. Sure, some of the roads evidenced damage from Irene, but they were passable, and even interesting to see, from a sensational point of view.
